Document.Focus: Abdominal aortic aneurysm repair - open - discharge

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Abdominal aortic aneurysm repair - open - discharge
QAPair.Answer: Open abdominal aortic aneurysm (AAA) repair is surgery to fix a widened part in your aorta. This is called an aneurysm. The aorta is the large artery that carries blood to your belly (abdomen), pelvis, and legs.
